name: 99Seconds
synopsis: 99Seconds, a fun retro-style video game where you can modify time to avoid all kinds of dangers. After finishing off Black Eye, V-99 entered a mysterious zone called Bit 8. Without knowing why V-99 could modify time, slow it down and even stop it but everything became complicated with the appearance of the BLACK VECTORS, mysterious beings that aim to destroy any intruder who reaches Bit 8. * Control V-99, dodging, using SLOW DOWN to slow, stop and even go back in time! * Arcade mobility, like in the classic arcade games! * Retro-style levels! * Incredible enemy patterns!
